alert.note: Alert for Allen; Huntington; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Allen, southeastern Whitley, northeastern Huntington and northeastern Wells Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Fort Wayne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with heavy downpours. Road ponding and localized nuisance flooding is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Haven around 900 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 285 and 308. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
